RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 12200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN CHELLA broke alertly, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and won under mild urging. SHEA D CAPTURE chased the winner and was no match while clearly second best. RESERVATION allowed to settle, passed a tiring rival through the stretch. DOMI stalked the pace into the far turn then weakened. POSITRACTION was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Reservation
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Positraction
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Shea D Capture
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, no match for winner, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Chella
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMUDGE THE CAT sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, shook clear under right handed urging and won under confident handling. CATCHING MAGIC stalked the early pace, offered a bid three wide into the stretch, drifted to the six path late and finished clear for second. CAJUN BAYOU with the second flight, between horses, swung wide and finished with good courage in the seven path. BAY DEFENSE pressured the winner two wide into the stretch and weakened late. PRETTY LOUD was hustled along, stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch and gave way late. AWESOME BREAK dropped back from an alert start and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Smudge the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, shook clear right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Loud
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, stalked pace, inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Bay Defense
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, between horses, swung wide, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Catching Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, second best 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Break
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 3. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weig ht Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAMANRASSETT stalked the pace into the stretch, responded under left then right handed urging three wide to make the lead late and drew clear. KLAATU battled for the lead two wide and gamely gained second. DEBDURITE matched strides for the lead along the inside into the stretch, edged clear near the furlong marker then was outfinished. ROSAS WAY failed to menace. GILES was no threat. KRAMDEN was no factor. HOLY TRUTH well placed, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: contended inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rallied late, left then right handed urging, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Klaatu
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, gamely gained second

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANZA MAGIC battled for the early lead along the inside, took charge on the turn, set the balance of the pace and widened through the stretch under a brisk hand ride to win as much the best. PATTI LOU trailed early, rallied outside rivals on the turn and finished clear for second in the seven path. SHANGHAI ROYALTY saved ground into the stretch, altered course to the eight path near the furlong marker then finished evenly. BUSYBEING FABULOUS battled with the winner two wide down the backstretch, had speed into the stretch and faded late. PENNIESANDDIMES steadied between the top pair near the nine sixteenths pole, dropped back before the turn then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground early, altered course 8path 1/8pole, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Danza Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside early, full of run, much the best, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesanddimes
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied between horses 9/16pole, dropped back, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Patti Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied outside turn, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Busybeing Fabulous
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 3. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNIDENTIFIED MAN with the second flight along the inside, shifted out on the turn, rallied in the eight path under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. HOLY SAINT battled for the lead two wide into the stretch, shook clear when put to a left handed whip, drifted out to the seven path late then couldn't handle the winner. VALEROSO contested the lead along the inside for a half, drifted to the five path entering the stretch then faded late. SAVAGE NATION was hustled along to press the pace three then two wide into the stretch and weakened inside the final furlong. YO BERBS was no factor. QIAN B C was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Unidentified Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, angled out turn, rallied 8p, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Valeroso
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, drifted 5path, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, shook clear upper stretch, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Savage Nation
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed pace, 3 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Berbs
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Qian B C
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWTOWN BOSS broke in front, set all the pace with a clear advantage and just lasted under left handed urging. JEBIP trailed early, rallied inside the winner through the stretch and just missed. GIV'EM THE BIZ chased the winner two wide into the stretch, drifted to the five path then went evenly. TWINSPIREDJOEY bobbled at the start, chased the winner from the inside into the turn then weakened. CATMAN JACK had brief speed three wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Jebip
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally inside winner, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Twinspiredjoey
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, chased inside turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, drifted,5 path top lane, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowtown Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, just lasted, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Catman Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 97. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered I n Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISON KARTER broke in front, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best while taken in hand through the final yards. KING OF THE RING stalked the pace three wide, dropped inside at the top of the stretch and finished clearly second best. BLOOD MOON close up from the start four wide, moved up three wide into the far turn then leveled off. ROYAL DRAGOON was shut off at the start, trailed into the stretch, swung wide and had a mild late rally. ENJOY BASEBALL pressured the winner two wide into the far turn then weakened. JACK'S ADVANTAGE well placed, failed to respond. HARD N'SWEET stumbled outward at the start and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: King of the Ring
ENTRY.OWNER: Pappada Julie A and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, dropped inside, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Raison Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled outward start, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dragoon
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: shut off start, trailed, swung wide, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Advantage
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 3 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) ( Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOMITIA LUCILLA stalked the pace into the stretch, was put to a left handed whip, surged to make the lead in the final stages and just lasted. CATCHAFALLNSTAR trailed into the stretch, swung wide, closed with a burst of speed in the middle of the racetrack and just missed getting up in time. LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS broke in front, set the pace two wide into the stretch under a firm hold, drew clear when put to left handed urging past the three sixteenth pole, maintained the advantage until the final stages then was outfinished. LOVE'S TAVITO found her best stride late two wide. HONEYBELL failed to menace. BOLD AND BOSSY pressed the pace along the inside early, dropped back on the turn and faded late. WICKED WONDER close up, improved position three wide into the turn then came up empty. CLASSIC TALE SAVER was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Catchafallnstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, closed fast, just missed, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Tale Saver
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold and Bossy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Lanalikeschoochoos
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC and Meyer Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, shook clear, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Love's Tavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Domitia Lucilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, surged late 7path, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybell
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, improved 3 wide turn, empty,
